message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $95. I think it's a great deal and will be really valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to pay a fair price for the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget concerns, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $90? It's a fair price considering the value you'll get out of it.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we try $87? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.
